name: YouTube homepage cleanup
description:
Cleans up the YouTube homepage (late 2012 redesign).
- Removes the rightmost ("Recommended") sidebar
- Reduces row height of listed videos
additional_info:
<dl>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.1</dfn> (<time>02/14/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>(Hopefully?) fixed thumbnails, [+] button on thumbnails, and background of loading / error messages.</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.2</dfn> (<time>02/16/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Apparently, YouTube have decided to resize their thumbnail images to exactly the same size this style was using, so I could remove a lot of my code. Thanks YouTube! Also, further reduced the height of each video by right aligning the view counter.</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.3</dfn> (<time>08/07/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Adjusted to new YouTube homepage layout. Nobody needs those huge thumbnails, YouTube! Also, I removed the reminders setting. Now, only the "Join Google+" reminder is removed automatically.</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.4</dfn> (<time>08/08/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Minor fix.</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.5</dfn> (<time>08/11/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Updated frame for channel icon.</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.6</dfn> (<time>09/02/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Removed speech bubble around channel icon, because YouTube kept changing the spritesheet. Also saves a bit more space.</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.7</dfn> (<time>12/12/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Updated for yet another YouTube redesign. Removed the options (no longer necessary).</dd>
  <dt>Version <dfn>1.8</dfn> (<time>12/15/2012</time>)</dt>
  <dd>Small border fixes; make sure to only apply to pages we want to change.</dd>
</dl>
